page.title: 06AN OLD LADY REMEMBERS
page.content:
How has Ormskirk changed ? The centre of the town used to have roads running through it and the market was there a long time before the pedestrianised it. The population and the size of the town has grown but the College has been here for as long as I can remember. There used to be a few cinemas and more car parks have now been built because the town is much busier than it used to be. There was no hospital when I first came to the town but that was a long time ago. What has stayed the same ? The churches have stayed the same and the market and the clock tower have not really altered at all.
Mrs Betton Aged 80.
